blogPost.excerpt: Night Eye WP dark mode plugin is a powerful software that uses advanced algorithm to enable dark mode on your WordPress website. Night Eye uses smart color conversion, is highly customizable and extremely easy to use.
blogPost.body: Night Eye WP dark mode plugin is a powerful software that uses advanced algorithm to enable dark mode on your WordPress website. Night Eye uses smart color conversion, is highly customizable and extremely easy to use.
blogPost.title: WordPress Dark Mode Plugin - Add smooth dark mode on your WordPress website
blogPost.author: Stanislav Dimitrov

localize.description: 夜眼WP黑暗模式插件是一款功能强大的软件，它采用先进的算法，可以让您的WordPress网站启用黑暗模式。夜眼使用智能颜色转换，高度可定制，使用起来极为方便。
localize.tagline: 在您的WordPress网站上添加平滑的黑暗模式

next.excerpt: Focus on one important task today. You decide what to focus on. After you set today's task you can't change or delete it. Keep a streak of days you finished your daily task.

localize.description: 今天专注于一项重要任务。你决定专注于什么。当你设定了今天的任务后，你就不能更改或删除它。保持你完成每日任务的天数的连贯性。
今天專注於一項重要任務。你決定專注於什麼。當你設定了今天的任務後，你就不能更改或刪除它。保持你完成每日任務的天數的連貫性。
